title: Demo Application using Node.js
features: Architected a scalable Node.js application with modular Express routes, isolating business logic in app.js and constants.js to enhance code readability and facilitate unit testing.
Implemented environment‑agnostic configuration management via constants.js and index.js, enabling seamless deployment across development, staging, and production environments.
Established automated testing and CI/CD workflows that achieved 95% code coverage, reducing post‑release defects by 40%.
